A while ago, a website talked about the dangers of public check-ins. Public check-ins are when you tell everyone online where you are. The website said that when you say, "I’m at this place," you are also telling many people where you are, and some of them might not be people you want to meet. This shows that sharing everything online can have bad sides. 

The internet gives us many chances to share our lives with many people. We can share our stories, photos, and feelings. But sometimes, we can get lost in this sharing. It can feel sad, but we should not give up. There are lessons from people who used the internet a long time ago. 

In January 1994, a 19-year-old student named Justin Hall started sharing his life online. At that time, the internet was mostly for students and scientists. Hall wanted to share his life, so he created a blog. He wrote about everything and shared many photos. In 1996, he began posting every day, and many people started to read his blog. 

One day, people went to his blog and found a sad video instead of his usual posts. Hall had fallen in love, but when he wrote about it, his partner said he had to choose between the blog and their relationship. Hall chose his partner, but he felt that sharing his life online made people not trust him. 

In 2002, a woman named Heather Armstrong had a blog called Dooce. She sometimes wrote about her job. One day, a coworker sent her blog link to their bosses, and she lost her job because of it. This shows that what we say online can have real-life consequences. 

Armstrong was sad and stopped blogging for a while, but later she got married and started a new blog about her family. Now, she is very popular and makes money from her writing. 

The important lesson is that while the internet lets us say anything, we should think carefully before we share.

A while ago, some scientists started to warn people about a low-budget movie called What the Bleep Do We Know? This movie mixes real-life facts and stories to show that there is a lot we do not understand about our universe. Scientists can be a bit proud, but even the most confident ones do not say they know everything about the universe. Some scientists felt they needed to warn people about the movie, calling it “atrocious” and “very dangerous.” This made me curious to watch it.

At first, I did not understand why the movie was so important. Some scientists talked about new discoveries that show the universe is stranger than we thought. But when the movie talked about these discoveries, I started to see why people were interested. One claim was that water molecules can be changed by our thoughts. I had heard about a Japanese researcher who said that the shape of water could change based on how people feel. The movie showed pictures of ice crystals that looked beautiful when people were happy and ugly when people were in a bad mood. Many people find this idea interesting, but scientists often say, “Give me a break.” 

The idea that water can be affected by thoughts is amazing, but we need real proof. Pretty pictures are not enough. The movie did not go far enough with its claims. For example, scientists have found that water molecules have special energy linked to a force that is making the universe grow. This idea comes from many years of research, not just a few nice pictures. 

Scientists have discovered that the universe is made of a strange kind of matter and is pushed by something called “dark energy.” There are also amazing discoveries happening on Earth. For example, scientists found that our brains take about half a second to understand what is happening around us. Anthropologists believe they have found where modern humans first lived and how they spread around the world. Some scientists think there is a connection between life on Earth and the design of the universe.

Science is not finished. In fact, we are learning that many things in nature are more complicated than we thought. New ideas like chaos and quantum uncertainty show that there are limits to what we can know. Some of the best scientists are trying to create a “Theory of Everything” to explain all the forces and particles in the universe. But many of us believe that the universe is best described with one word: incredible.

Writing novels is hard for me, but writing short stories is fun. Writing a novel is like planting a big forest, while writing a short story is like planting a small garden. Both are important to me. In the forest, the trees give shade, and the wind moves the leaves, which can turn bright gold. In the garden, flowers bloom, and their colors attract bees and butterflies. 

Since I started writing, I have often switched between novels and short stories. After I finish a novel, I want to write short stories. After I finish a group of short stories, I want to write a novel. I never write short stories while writing a novel, and I never write a novel while working on short stories. Writing these two types of stories uses different parts of my brain, and it takes time to change from one to the other.

I began my career with two short novels in 1975. Then, from 1984 to 1985, I started writing short stories. I didn’t know much about writing short stories, so it was hard, but it was a great experience. I felt my imagination grow, and readers liked this new side of me. One of my first short stories, “Breaking Waves,” was in my first collection called Tales from Abroad. 

One great thing about writing short stories is that they don’t take long to finish. Usually, it takes me about a week to write a short story, but I can change it many times. Writing a novel takes a year or two, and it can feel very long. Sometimes, I wonder if I will finish. So, writing short stories is a nice change for me. 

Another good thing about short stories is that you can create a story from small ideas, like a thought or an image. Writing a short story feels like playing jazz music, where the story goes where it wants. Also, if a short story doesn’t work out, it’s okay. Not every story has to be perfect. Even famous writers like F. Scott Fitzgerald and Raymond Carver have stories that are not great. This makes me feel better. 

I learn from my mistakes in short stories and use that knowledge when I write novels. Short stories help me try new things that I can’t do in a novel. Without short stories, writing novels would be harder for me. My short stories are like soft shadows I have left in the world. I remember where I wrote each one and how I felt. Short stories show my feelings, and I am happy to share them with my readers.

Science is a way to understand the world. It can help us find cures for diseases and make our lives easier. However, it can also create problems. Science tries to explain many things, from tiny atoms to the universe. It has influenced many people, including poets and politicians. 

Sometimes, people do not understand science well. Some think it is very important, while others do not. Scientists often disagree with each other. They change their ideas when they find new information. This can be hard for society because it challenges what we believe. 

This book will talk about important ideas in science. We will look at how these ideas have changed how we think. Science has practical uses, but we will focus on the ideas themselves. Science is always changing. There is always a scientist who finds something new that changes what we thought before. 

For example, in the 1600s, scientists thought the universe worked like a big clock. Later, new ideas made us think differently about how we see the universe. Some people believe that science cannot explain everything, but new discoveries often help us understand more. 

In the past, scientists thought they had learned everything important. But then they discovered things like radioactivity and the electron. Science has also made big discoveries in biology. 

Today, some people believe we are close to finding a complete explanation of the universe. Science is important because it affects our lives. We are not just watching nature; we are changing it. This can sometimes cause problems we do not understand. 

Everyone should pay attention to science because it will shape the future for our children. The choices we make in science can affect many things, like health and the environment. Science is not just for scientists; it is important for everyone.

From around 2015, many big book publishers noticed that sales of ebooks were not growing anymore. In some cases, sales even went down. This made people question if ebooks would be important in the future. One publishing executive said that the excitement about ebooks might have led to bad investments, and his company lost trust in printed books. 

Even though it seems that ebooks and printed books can exist together, people still ask if ebooks will replace printed books. This question is interesting and makes people talk a lot. Why do we think of ebooks and printed books as being in competition? The answers to these questions are not just about ebooks; they show how we feel about new technology and change.

In my research, I found that people often think one type of media will replace another when new technology comes out. For example, when television was invented, many people thought radio would disappear. But radio found new ways to be used, like in cars and factories. The idea that books might disappear is not new either. In 1894, some people thought that phonographs would replace books with audiobooks.

Many times, people have said that new things like movies, radio, and smartphones would end printed books. Some believed that if books disappeared, culture would suffer. Others thought ebooks would be much better. The idea that books might die often comes up when new technology appears. This shows our mixed feelings about change.

We feel strong connections to different types of media, like books and computers. Studies show that we can even name our cars or get upset with our laptops. When new technology, like e-readers, comes out, it changes our relationship with things we love. As technology changes, we often miss what we used to have. This is why some people still want older products.

For example, when the printing press was invented in the 15th century, people wanted original handwritten books. When movies changed from silent to sound in the 1920s, people felt nostalgic for silent films. The same thing happened when photography changed from film to digital and from vinyl records to CDs. E-readers have made people appreciate the feel and smell of printed books even more.

This should make people feel better about the future of printed books. However, the idea that books might disappear will continue to be a popular story about technology and our fear of change. One way we deal with change is by telling stories that are easy to remember, like stories of loss. The story of the death of the book reflects both our excitement for new things and our fear of losing what we love.

For a year and a half, I woke up every weekday at 5:30 in the morning. I brushed my teeth, made coffee, and wrote about how great thinkers from the last four hundred years did their best work. I wanted to show how they organized their days to be creative and productive. I wrote about their daily lives, like when they slept, ate, and worked. I hoped to show their personalities and habits.

A famous French writer, Jean Anthelme Brillat-Savarin, said, “Tell me what you eat, and I shall tell you what you are.” I say, “Tell me what time you eat, and if you take a nap.” This book is about how people create, not just what they create. It is also personal. The writer John Cheever said that even a business letter shows something about you. 

I have questions that I think about in my own life: How can you do meaningful work and also make money? Is it better to focus on one project or to work a little each day? When there is not enough time, do you have to give up things like sleep or a clean house? Or can you learn to do more in less time? I do not have all the answers, but I want to show how many successful people faced similar challenges. 

The book is called Daily Rituals, but it is really about people’s routines. Routines can seem boring, but they can help us use our time and energy better. A good routine can help us stay focused and avoid distractions. The psychologist William James said that good habits can help us think about more interesting things. 

Ironically, William James was a procrastinator and had trouble keeping a schedule. I started this book because of my own procrastination. One Sunday, I was trying to write a story for work but ended up cleaning my desk and making coffee instead. I am a morning person and work best in the early hours. That afternoon, I looked online for information about other writers’ schedules. I found many interesting stories and thought it would be good to collect them. This led to the Daily Routines blog and now this book.

In the blog, I shared people’s routines from biographies and articles. For the book, I gathered more information and tried to keep it interesting. I let the people I wrote about share their own words from letters and interviews. I also summarized some routines from other sources. This book would not be possible without the help of many biographers and researchers. I have listed all my sources in the Notes section for further reading.

Howard wanted to be a palaeontologist since he was six years old. When he was a child, his father said they could not go on holiday to Spain because of money problems. Instead, they went to a beach in England. On a rainy day, Howard found a fossil called an ammonite on the beach. He always wanted to study ancient life.

When he finished university, Howard knew he wanted to study the very early life forms, not dinosaurs. He worked hard on his research for his doctorate. He was worried about finding a job after he finished. He felt confident in his skills, but he knew that sometimes good people do not get good jobs.

When a job opened at Tavistock College in London, Howard applied right away, but he did not expect much. On the day of his interview, the professor who was supposed to help him had a fight with his wife and got into an accident. He could not attend the interview. Another professor, who did not like the first one, took his place. This professor helped Howard get the job, even though Howard did not know him.

Howard was surprised and thankful to get the job, but later he learned that it was not just because of his skills. He was a little disappointed but happy to have the job he wanted.

Howard liked his work because he could plan and do his research. However, his personal life was sometimes chaotic. One day, someone stole his briefcase with his lecture notes at a train station. He was very upset and went back to the college. He called to postpone his lecture and reported the theft. After that, he had coffee with a colleague who was visiting from the Natural History Museum in Nairobi. 

During this meeting, Howard learned about a new collection of fossils that needed to be studied. This was a big opportunity for him. Because of the theft, he changed his plans. He decided not to go to a conference in Stockholm or take students to Scotland. Instead, he would find a way to visit the museum in Nairobi to study the fossils.

Charles Spence eats many different foods. He even has ice cream made from bee larvae at home. It may look strange, but it tastes a little like nuts and flowers. Spence is a Professor of Experimental Psychology at Oxford University in the UK. He studies how our senses work together to help us taste food. His work helps change what we eat and drink, from big food companies to fancy restaurants.

Spence and his team study many things about food. For example, who we eat with, how food is arranged, and even the color and weight of plates can change how we taste food. In his book, The Perfect Meal, he shares interesting facts about eating. Did you know that the first person to order food in a restaurant usually enjoys their meal more? And when we eat with one other person, we eat about 35% more food. With three people, we eat 75% more!

Spence's lab in Oxford is simple, not high-tech. He has soundproof booths and old audio equipment. This helps him work with chefs who do not have a lot of money for research. Many of his projects are funded by big food companies. In the past, some people thought that research funded by companies was not real science. But now, it is important for universities to show that their work matters to people.

Spence helps food companies reduce salt and sugar in their products. This is good for customers because it helps them stay healthy. Many companies make these changes slowly so that customers do not notice. Spence says that if people know about the changes, they may not like the food as much.

Spence met famous chef Heston Blumenthal while working on a project. They worked together to create a dish called "Sound of the Sea." Spence studies how sounds can change the taste of food. For example, high music can make food taste sweeter, while low music can make it taste bitter. Soon, an airline will match music with the food they serve.

Spence has fun at home too. He has had dinner parties where they eat rabbit with fur on the cutlery and play with colorful lights. They even tested different drinks with sounds to see how they taste. For Spence, home and food events are just like his lab.

Our brains are very busy today. We get a lot of information, like facts, rumors, and opinions. We have to find out what is important and what we can ignore. We are also doing more things than before. Thirty years ago, travel agents helped us book flights, and salespeople helped us in stores. Now, we do most things by ourselves. We are trying to do the work of many people while also managing our lives, families, jobs, hobbies, and favorite TV shows. Our smartphones help us with this, but they also make us feel like we need to do everything at once.

However, we are not really good at multitasking, which means doing many things at the same time. A scientist named Earl Miller says our brains are not made for multitasking. When we think we are multitasking, we are actually switching quickly between tasks. This can make us less efficient. Multitasking can also increase stress in our bodies, making it hard to think clearly.

Our brains can easily get distracted by new things. This makes it hard to focus on one task. Just having the chance to multitask can hurt our ability to think well. A researcher named Glenn Wilson found that trying to focus while seeing unread emails can lower our IQ by almost 10 points. This is worse than being tired.

When we try to learn new things while multitasking, the information can go to the wrong part of our brain. For example, if students do homework while watching TV, they may not remember the information well. Without distractions, they can remember better.

Making decisions while multitasking is also hard for our brains. Small decisions can take as much energy as big ones. After making many small decisions, we might make bad choices about important things.

Many people, including business leaders and scientists, talk about the problem of too many emails. It is not that emails are bad, but the large number of them can be overwhelming. One scientist’s son said his dad answers emails for a living, and the scientist agreed that it is true. We feel we must reply to emails, but it can be hard to do that and get other work done.

In a zoo in Sweden, a chimpanzee named Santino broke concrete at night. He threw the pieces at visitors during the day. Was he being mean? In caves in the US, female bats help other bats that are not their babies if those mothers cannot give birth properly. Are they being kind? Fifty years ago, people did not think much about these questions. They believed animals just acted in ways that could be measured, and scientists only looked at those actions. The idea that animals have feelings and thoughts was not taken seriously. 

But now, this is changing. Research on bats, chimps, rats, dolphins, and chickens shows that animals have emotions. This new idea is being talked about in popular science books, like Mark Bekoff’s "Wild Justice" and Victoria Braithwaite’s "Do Fish Feel Pain?". This has started a big discussion: do animals have thoughts and feelings like humans? 

Another question is about conscience, which is a person’s sense of right and wrong. In a recent study with cows, those that opened a locked gate to get food seemed happier than those that had help. If cows enjoy solving problems, what does this mean for how we raise and eat cows? While people agree on what they see, they do not agree on what it means. Dr. Jonathan Balcombe, who wrote "Second Nature," believes we should stop eating meat. He thinks this is a big change in how we think about ethics, like when slavery ended. 

Aubrey Manning, a professor, thinks we should rethink how we see animal intelligence. He believes animals have a simpler way of thinking than humans. Professor Euan MacPhail thinks we should not put human feelings onto animals. These three people may never agree because the main issue is not just science or morals, but philosophy. It is hard to define what consciousness is, so can we really know what it is like to be a bat?

Balcombe did an important study that suggests starlings, a type of bird, can feel sad. In this study at Newcastle University, starlings were kept in two different types of cages. One group had nice cages with space and water, while the other group had small, empty cages. Both groups learned to eat tasty worms from one box and avoid bad worms from another. But when only bad worms were offered, only the starlings in nice cages would eat. Balcombe thinks that being in a bad cage made the starlings feel negative about life.

Balcombe, who supports animal rights, believes that in the future, people will look back and feel bad about how we treated animals, just like we feel bad about racism. He says we cannot support animal rights while eating meat. If he were the only one with this opinion, it might be easy to ignore him. But Professor Aubrey Manning agrees with him. Manning has written a book about animal behavior. He says we are changing our views again. In the past, people thought animals thought like us, but now we are seeing things differently. This is a complicated topic, and it is important to listen carefully to different opinions.

Critical thinking is a way to understand better what we read or hear. Adrian West, a research director, says that arguing can help us find the truth. Technology helps us store and process information, but it can also make it harder to think deeply about problems. West points out that we see a lot of poor thinking and opinions that can confuse us. More information does not always mean we make better decisions. 

According to the National Endowment for the Arts, fewer people are reading books, and this is getting worse. Patricia Greenfield, a psychology professor, believes that focusing more on visual media, like videos, can hurt our critical thinking. People are multitasking and not focusing on one thing. 

We do not yet know exactly how technology affects critical thinking. Technology can change how we think in different ways. For example, some computer games can help us think critically, while reading online can improve our analysis skills. However, jumping from one link to another on the internet can make it hard to think deeply.

Greenfield says that reading helps our thinking and imagination more than visual media like video games and TV. Reading builds our imagination and vocabulary. But she also found that some visual media can help with processing information. Unfortunately, many visual media do not give us time to think or reflect.

This can lead to many young people not reaching their full potential. How society views technology affects how we think about critical thinking. There is a debate about whether video games are good or bad for kids. James Paul Gee, a professor, says that video games can be a good way to learn. They can help children develop better reasoning skills. Games like Sim City and Civilization teach decision-making and analytical skills in a fun way. 

In the digital age, as reading and math scores go down, we need to understand better how technology affects our thinking.

Matthew Crawford is a motorcycle mechanic. He used to work in an office but did not like it. He writes about how we should live our lives. His first book talks about the good things about working with your hands. His latest book is about how to deal with modern life. 

One day, while shopping, he saw ads on a credit card machine while he was entering his pin number. This made him think about how hard it is to avoid distractions. He believes that we often cannot choose what to think about because of things we do not notice. It is becoming harder to think or remember conversations. People are also avoiding simple things like talking to strangers because they do not want to be interrupted.

Crawford says we see the world through things like video games and apps. These things show us what we want, but they can take over our lives. Many people complain about emails at work but still check emails in their free time. Studies show that just seeing a phone can make it hard to focus. 

Crawford thinks that technology is not the only problem. It has made it easy for us to focus on ourselves. We have many choices, which makes it hard to control ourselves. For example, we prefer to text friends instead of talking to them. He believes that by only interacting with screens, we lose important connections with real people.

He gives an example of his gym. Before, there was one music player for everyone, which could cause some disagreements. Now, people listen to their own music with earbuds. The gym used to be a place to meet others, but now it feels different. 

Crawford has two ideas to help. First, we need to reduce noise and distractions in public places. Second, he believes we should practice skills that help us connect with the real world. For example, cooks, hockey players, and motorcycle racers must focus on real things. They use their judgment and work with others around them. 

Crawford says that when we engage with the real world, we see that fake experiences are not as good. He does not mean everyone should become a chef, but it is important to use our judgment. Focusing on one thing can help us pay attention to other things too.

"What do you do for a living?" This is a common question. People often talk about their jobs. But if you are a philosopher, like me, it can be a bit tricky. Saying "I am a philosopher" can sound a bit showy. It is better to say that you study or teach philosophy. Many people think philosophers know special truths, but this is not true. Philosophers are just like everyone else.

One reason people think this way is that philosophers often judge what others do and talk about thinking. A famous Greek philosopher, Aristotle, said that thinking deeply about life is the best way to live. Many modern philosophers do not agree, but people still connect philosophy with thinking.

Another Greek philosopher, Socrates, said that a life without self-reflection is not worth living. This means that just following what everyone else does can make life less satisfying. Thinking about our lives helps us make better choices. 

However, you do not need to read many difficult books or think all the time to reflect on your life. It just means looking closely at your daily experiences to see if they are important. You do not have to be away from society to think about it. In fact, thinking about life can help us live better, and we should share our knowledge with others.

There is a problem, though. Academic philosophy has become very separate from everyday life. Many philosophers only talk to other experts and do not explain their ideas to regular people. This makes philosophy seem far away from real life. 

I sometimes call myself an "ethicist" because I study ethics, which is about what is right and wrong. Recently, I feel this title does not fully describe my work. Ethics is often seen as related to rules and laws. But there is more to it. Ethics can also look at social practices and whether they are fair.

For example, we might discuss if downloading movies illegally is wrong (it is) and then think about our ideas of responsibility and art. Philosophy can help us understand our actions and beliefs better. Sometimes we might find out we already know something, and other times we might see that our beliefs are hard to explain. By thinking about these ideas, we can help everyone.

**Simplified Text:**

Many people love food, like foodies, chefs, and gourmands. They think that thinking about what we eat and how we eat can make eating more enjoyable. In the past, when philosophers talked about food, they often used it to explain other ideas, like learning. Sometimes, discussions about food seem to be about food, but they are really about other topics.

One famous philosopher, Epicurus, believed in seeking pleasure and avoiding pain. He talked about many activities, but people now often connect his name with enjoying food and drink. Many restaurants and food shops use his name because they think it will attract customers.

Food is social and cultural. We do not just eat food; it comes from history and is shared with our communities. These communities help us grow and share food. We interact with food more than with other things, so it is a good topic to think about.

When food is ready, critics write and talk about it. Some people wonder why food critics are important. One philosopher said that tasting food is not a special skill; critics are just better at describing how food tastes. Most discussions about how we sense things focus on sight, but taste should also be studied.

Another interesting point is how we think about the beauty of food. We say paintings or music are beautiful, but we do not usually say this about food. Some philosophers believe that food should be considered beautiful too, especially with the rise of modern cooking. However, food is eaten and gone, while art stays for a long time. This makes it hard to say food is beautiful in the same way.

There are also many ethical questions about food. We can ask what we should eat: organic, free-range, local, vegetarian, or non-GMO foods? Our answers show our beliefs. Philosophers like to discuss these questions about food.

Cooking at home is different from cooking in restaurants. Home cooks have a special duty to their friends and family. Everyone shares food and time together. But restaurant cooks work for their employers and have different responsibilities. Their kitchens are not open to everyone, and they work with colleagues, not friends.

A recent essay called "Diplomacy of the Dish" talks about how food can help people from different cultures connect. We can learn to enjoy other people's food and build friendships by eating together. The essay includes many interesting examples and stories that make food philosophy come alive for everyone.

Rob Daviau is a game designer from the US. He makes special board games called "legacy" games. When he was a child, he played traditional board games, but he thought they were not fun or challenging anymore. He wanted to create new types of board games with stories and choices that matter in different games.

He changed a classic game called Risk to make a new version called Risk Legacy. In this game, the choices players make can change the game forever. Players might have to tear up cards, change the game board, or open new packets with different rules. The game is played over several sessions, and players can remember past events in the game. Daviau said, “You could point to the board and say: ‘Right here! You did this!’”

After Risk Legacy, he worked on a legacy version of another game called Pandemic. In Pandemic, players work together to cure diseases. His next game was SeaFall, which is set in the time of sailing ships. In SeaFall, players explore a new world. Designers of legacy games must think about all the choices players can make to keep the story interesting. They use play-testers to see how the game works. Jaime Barriga was a play-tester for SeaFall. He said it takes a lot of time to test the game. Sometimes the game works well at first, but later it can break, and they have to fix it.

At first, Daviau did not think legacy games would be very popular. He thought only a few people would like them. But many players, like Russell Chapman, really enjoy them. He thinks legacy games are a big step forward in game design. He said, “It’s a new level of commitment, intensity, excitement.” Another fan, Ben Hogg, said that even though players worry about changing the game, they love the adventure. He compared it to watching a new movie instead of the same one again.

Legacy games are inspired by video games and popular TV shows. Daviau wanted to be a TV writer when he was in college, but he ended up in advertising and then game design. He still loves telling stories. Matt Leacock, the creator of Pandemic, said making legacy games is like writing a book. You need to know how the story starts and ends, but you also need to plan the details.

Daviau is happy with his work but is curious to see how others will use his ideas. He thinks players will soon want something new. Colby Dauch, who works for the company that published SeaFall, believes legacy games have changed how people think about board games.

One night not long ago, an octopus named Inky escaped from his tank at the National Aquarium in New Zealand. He crawled across the floor and squeezed into a small drain that led to the Pacific Ocean. This story was exciting and many people shared it online. 

People enjoy stories about animals escaping because they like to think that animals are like us. Octopuses are very smart and can do many interesting things. They can open jars, recognize faces, use coconut shells for protection, and even play games. 

Dr. Frans de Waal studies animals like gorillas and chimpanzees. He believes that we often do not see how smart animals really are. He says that animals can think about the past and future, feel empathy, and understand what others want. This means animals are smarter than we usually think.

In the past, people believed that animals were smart. For example, in medieval Europe, animals could be put on trial for crimes. Charles Darwin, who had important ideas about evolution, also thought that animals and humans are similar in some ways. 

In the twentieth century, many people started to think of animals as simple machines that only react to rewards and punishments. This idea made people forget that animals might have feelings and thoughts. During this time, humans also harmed animal habitats and did not care about animal welfare.

Now, Dr. de Waal thinks we are starting to understand that animals can think in ways similar to humans. He says that we are learning more about animal intelligence every day. 

He believes that tests for animal intelligence should consider what each animal is good at. For example, squirrels might not do well on human memory tests, but they can remember where they hide their nuts. 

In her book, naturalist Sy Montgomery says that if an octopus tested human intelligence, it might look at how well we can change the colors of our skin. If we could not do this, the octopus might think we are not very smart.

Dr. de Waal is not sure if Inky really knew how to escape to the ocean. He knows that stories like Inky's help people appreciate how smart animals can be. He once did an experiment with monkeys to see if they could feel envy. When some monkeys got cucumbers and others got grapes, the ones with cucumbers got very upset. This study was published in a scientific journal, but a video of the experiment made more people believe the findings. 

This shows how interesting and complex animal minds can be.

Robots are becoming very important in our world. They are not just in stories anymore; they are changing how we work. For many years, robots have helped in factories and car making. Now, experts say that robots will be used in many more areas soon, but many people are not ready for this change.

Many people think that robots will do most of the work that humans do in the next 50 years. However, most of them also believe that their jobs will stay the same. This is not true. Robots will affect all types of jobs in the coming years. For example, an Australian company called Fastbrick Robotics made a robot named Hadrian X. This robot can lay 1,000 bricks in one hour. It would take two human workers a whole day to do the same job.

Another example is a robot called Tally, made by a company in San Francisco. Tally walks around supermarkets to check if the shelves are full and the prices are right. It does not clean the aisles, as some might think.

Some people say that robots cannot fix or program themselves yet. This means there will be new jobs for people who can work with robots. But others worry that we need to keep the human touch in jobs. They think society is not ready for the changes that robots will bring.

Dr. Jing Bing Zhang is an expert on robots and how they will change jobs. He says that in two years, many robots will be smarter and work well with humans. In three years, many big companies will have a special person in charge of robots. In five years, salaries in the robot industry will go up, but there will still be many jobs that need skilled workers.

Zhang believes that lower-skilled workers will be affected by robots. He says they should not wait for the government to help them but should learn new skills. People cannot expect to do the same job forever.

New technologies will create new types of robots that we have not seen before. These robots will live with us in our homes and interact with us. This is a big chance for companies, but it also brings challenges, like making sure we are safe and our privacy is protected.

With many jobs at risk, it is important to focus on education. Countries need more graduates in science, technology, engineering, and math (STEM) to stay competitive in the future.

Text: George Mallory was a mountaineer who wanted to climb Mount Everest. When a reporter asked him why, he said, "Because it’s there." This answer shows that many people want to know why someone would take such a big risk to climb a mountain. Some people might feel inspired by his answer to follow their dreams. Climbing can be about adventure and having fun.

In 1967, a Bolivian writer named Tejada-Flores wrote an important essay called "Games that Climbers Play." He talked about seven different types of climbing, from playing on small rocks to climbing big mountains like those in the Himalayas. Each type of climbing has its own rules. This idea has become popular in climbing discussions in the West, including in magazines and conversations.

Many climbers love climbing because it makes them feel free. But climbing can also be very hard. For example, being stuck in a tent during a storm is not a fun experience. This shows that climbing can be both freeing and limiting. However, some people believe that having fewer choices while climbing can make life simpler and give a different kind of freedom.

Joe Fitschen, a US rock climber, wrote an essay where he asked, "Why do people climb?" He believes that climbing is part of who we are as humans. We like to take on challenges and test our limits, even if it is risky. The joy we feel from climbing is connected to our nature.

Another writer, Brian Treanor, said that climbing can help us develop important qualities like courage, humility, and respect for nature. He thinks these qualities are very important in today’s world, where people often avoid risks. Climbing can help us grow and live better lives outside of climbing.

Some expert climbers, Ebert and Robinson, believe that climbing alone is harder and deserves more recognition than climbing with a team or using extra help, like bottled oxygen. However, this idea has caused some controversy because it might encourage climbers to take unnecessary risks.

Climbing can also be understood in different ways. Many climbers talk about being in the moment or feeling a flow while climbing. The physical effort, the focus needed, and the problem-solving involved in climbing are very important. Some people say that climbing is similar to Zen philosophy, which helps train the mind to find peace. This idea can help us understand why many people are drawn to climbing.

Alfred Brendel is a famous pianist who played classical music for over sixty years. He was very smart and serious about his music. He played and recorded many important piano pieces, but he did not teach many students. People who knew him saw that he could be fun, but he did not show this side during his concerts. He spent his time studying, traveling, and performing.

About four or five years ago, a young boy named Kit Armstrong came to one of Brendel’s concerts and asked him for lessons. At first, Brendel did not think this was a good idea because he had very few students. He thought it was like asking a mountain guide to teach a child how to walk. But when he heard Kit play, he changed his mind. Kit was about 14 years old and played very well from memory. He even gave Brendel a CD of his performance, which impressed him a lot. Brendel thought Kit had a special talent.

Now, Kit is 19 years old and is always busy. He learns new languages, studies math, writes computer code, and plays tennis. His mother is always with him. Kit also composes music. Brendel believes that writing music helps him understand it better. He noticed that Kit has a great memory and can read music very well. Kit listens carefully to his own playing and understands Brendel’s lessons.

Brendel is careful not to raise expectations for Kit. He does not like when newspapers call Kit the next great pianist. He thinks this can be harmful. Young musicians can play some things very well, but they still need time to improve in other areas. 

Now at 80 years old, Brendel is more relaxed. He says that when he was young, he did not want to be famous quickly. He wanted to achieve certain goals by the time he was 50. When he reached 50, he felt he had done most of those things but still wanted to do more. Even though he cannot play as much now, he still thinks about music and enjoys his new life after performing.

When I was a child, I thought gardens were beautiful places. My grandad’s garden was by a river. It sloped down to the water. You couldn’t touch the river, but you could hear the water and the birds in the trees. I thought all gardens were like this – peaceful and quiet. 

Grandad’s garden was simple. He didn’t have a big greenhouse like some neighbors. Their greenhouses were made from old window frames and plastic. At home, my dad was often quiet. He liked to say funny things, like “It’s immaterial to me,” instead of “I don’t mind.” He left school without any qualifications and became a plumber, but he didn’t love it. He thought about moving to Canada with my mum, but it didn’t happen. 

My dad was good at fixing things around the house. He could build bookshelves and cupboards very well. My parents only moved house once, but my mum liked to change the furniture a lot. Just when you got used to one chair, a new one would appear. The biggest change was when a piano came into the house. I wanted to like it, but it made me nervous. I liked the two brass candlesticks on it, but my mum said they were too fancy and took them away. I never got to play the piano; my sister had lessons instead. When I asked my mum why, she said, “You’d never have practiced.”

I loved the river the most. I could imagine many things there. I would take a fishing net and wear old sandals with the front cut out for my toes. I walked along the riverbank looking for a good place to take off my sandals and have a picnic. I tried to catch fish, but they never lived long in my yard, so I put them back in the water.

I wanted to leave school quickly, but it seemed hard. One day, my dad told me there was a job for an apprentice gardener in the Parks Department. He thought I might like it. He usually wanted me to be a carpenter, but I think he hoped I would be happy as a gardener. Even though he didn’t like gardening, he saw how much I enjoyed it.

Lawrence MacEwen is on his Scottish island, the Isle of Muck. I am with him. A strong wind is blowing, and it feels like we might fall off the cliff into the ocean below. But Lawrence’s sheepdog, Tie, comes close, and Lawrence pets him gently. The wind is loud, but Lawrence is calm and happy on his island.

Lawrence shows me around. He points to the north and shouts, “That island is Eigg. The one next to it is the Isle of Rum. It rains a lot there.” I see dark clouds over Rum. “Beyond Rum is the island of Soay.” 

Suddenly, Lawrence says, “I need to move my sheep.” We walk down the hill. He tells me about the island: Muck is three kilometers long and one and a half kilometers wide. The geese here eat a lot of grass. The MacEwen family has lived on this island for 3000 years. 

While herding the sheep, Tie is not doing a good job. Lawrence tells him, “Away to me,” which means to go to the right, but Tie goes straight through the sheep. Lawrence sounds disappointed. 

The Isle of Muck is mostly run by the MacEwen family. Lawrence and his wife, Jenny, run the farm. Their son Colin takes care of the island cottages, and their daughter Mary runs the hotel, Port Mor, with her husband, Toby. Mary and Toby like that their two boys can play outside and sail boats in the summer. “They go out and come back when they are hungry,” Mary says.

But life on the island has some problems. There is electricity only sometimes. On my first night, I wait for the lights to come on. The next morning, I see Mary making breakfast with a flashlight. I also have no mobile phone service. Mary tells me, “You can get a signal on the hill, but most people just put their phones away after a few days.” So I do the same.

Life on Muck is surprising. A boat brings groceries and three musicians who come to play music in the tearoom. The islanders enjoy the concert and tap their feet to the rhythm. 

That night, by the warm fire, Lawrence tells me how he met Jenny. “Her father bought a small farm on Soay without seeing it. He had never been to Scotland. Jenny went to manage it.” I ask if Jenny knew how to run a farm. “She was good at typing,” he replies.

I go to bed listening to the rain and wake up to more rain. But I eat well because most of the food comes from the island. Mary sends me to fisherman Sandy Mathers for fresh fish. I carry it back to Mary’s kitchen. By 7 pm, we have a delicious fish dinner.

The next morning, I worry about my ferry to the next island. Many ferries have been canceled because of rough seas. If my ferry does not come, I will be stuck on Muck for two more days. Part of me secretly hopes for that.

Text: 

The game design industry used to be mostly for computer scientists and self-taught people. Many thought video games were just a hobby for young people. But now, the video game industry is taken seriously. It is not easy to get into this field. Making video games based on new movies needs many team members and a lot of skill and hard work. 

Jim Donelly, who works for an online games magazine, says it is hard to get a job in big companies. But the industry needs game designers now more than ever. They need not just the top people who manage the whole game, but also those who design parts of the game. 

So, how can you start a career in this competitive industry? Many companies want people with a degree in computer science, but Jim thinks differently. He says, "The best way is to make games. You need to create something to get a job. Game design is not just a job; it is a way of life." 

Another expert, John Field, agrees but adds that it is more complicated. Many people want to work in games, but few have the skills needed today. It is important to have creativity, technical skills, and the ability to think of new ideas. 

Can you succeed on your own? John says, "Maybe, but it is hard." A good course in game design can help you. Most game designers start as programmers or artists and then move up in their careers. They love all kinds of entertainment and are interested in art and culture. They may have worked for a few years after school but know that games are their passion. 

Connections are also important. To succeed in games, like in many jobs, you need to meet people in the industry. 

The idea that only young boys play video games is changing. Now, many families play games together on consoles and smartphones. John believes there is a lot of room for growth in this area. "Games are popular with many people. They are also a fun way to learn, and I see many new opportunities in this field."

Since I was a child, I have always wanted to play football. My dad encouraged me to play, but he never forced me. I am thankful for that. I had a friend whose dad was very strict. He always said, "You can’t do this, you can’t do that." My friend could have been a good player, but he stopped wanting to play football and never played again. I am happy that I still love the game.

When I score a great goal from far away, some people say it is just luck, but it is not. I have practiced shooting from a distance since I was a kid. You need to practice to score amazing goals. The best players in the world have natural talent, but they also practice a lot.

Sometimes, I see young players bumping into each other, but I learned the right way to play. When I teach kids, I always tell them to enjoy learning new skills. At school, I played many sports like rounders, baseball, athletics, and basketball. I know now that a good education is important, but back then, I only thought about football. The teachers did a good job, but I didn’t notice it at the time.

I don’t want my son to be like that. We are already trying to read him books, even though he is too young to sit still for long. I hope he doesn’t just want to kick the books around like I did.

At the start of my professional football career, the manager made big sacrifices so younger players like me could play for the first team. He never made a big speech about it, but we all knew we had to do our best. I scored in my first game, but we lost. A famous TV presenter said, "You can’t win anything with kids." This made us realize we had a lot to do. We had some doubts, but we believed in ourselves as a team.

I depend a lot on my close friends and family. Having money can sometimes cause problems. People ask me why my mother still works. I help my parents with money. I paid off their house loan and bought them a car for Christmas. My family is strong, and they don’t want to be treated like they need my money. My mom loves her job as a hairdresser, even if she doesn’t earn much. I enjoy using my money to help my family.

I have a lot of money, but not as much as people think. Money does not solve all my problems. After I stop playing football, I want to take a year off to do things I couldn’t do before. I want to go skiing the day after I stop playing. I can’t do that now because if I break my leg while skiing, I might not be able to play football again, and I wouldn’t be insured.

It was Sam Carter who helped us move to Reef Point. Sam was my father’s agent in Los Angeles. My father could not write anything while we lived there, so Sam wanted to help us find a cheap place to live. The beach at Reef Point was usually quiet because many people went to a nicer place called La Carmella nearby. But when summer came, many people started to visit Reef Point.

My father was busy every day trying to write a script. I often went to the beach with my dog, Rusty. When we first moved to Reef Point, we did not have a dog, but Rusty came to us. I tried to send him away, but he always came back. One day, I felt sorry for him and gave him some water. My father did not like Rusty at first, but he did not really try to chase him away.

Rusty loved the beach. He liked to dig and bring things to me, but sometimes he found things that did not belong to him, like a sneaker or a beach towel. I had to give those back to their owners. Rusty also liked to swim with me, even though I could swim better and faster than he could. 

One day, after swimming, my father went to Los Angeles to deliver his script. Rusty and I stayed on the beach and watched the surfers. They were having fun riding the waves. One surfer was very good and caught my attention. When she finished, she came over to talk to me. 

“Why didn’t you join us?” she asked. 

“I don’t have a surfboard,” I replied.

“You could get one,” she said.

“I don’t have any money,” I told her.

“Are you British? Are you visiting?” she asked.

“No, I live here,” I said.

“Is your father American?” she continued.

“No, he came here to write a film script from a novel he wrote,” I explained.

“Really? What’s his name?” she asked.

“Rufus Marsh,” I answered.

“Do you mean ‘Tall as the Morning’?” she said.

I nodded. “I read that book,” she said with interest. I felt happy because people were friendly when I talked about my father’s book.

Violet Hetherington was confused. She was in a long line at the dock in Southampton, waiting to get on the Queen Caroline ship. Her friend Annie had told her to arrive late to avoid waiting too long. But now, Violet wished she had come earlier. 

After some time, an announcement said there was a problem with the computer system. The people waiting became unhappy. They had paid a lot of money for this trip, and they wanted to enjoy it. Violet felt like she had made a mistake by coming on this cruise. 

She reached into her bag and realized her phone was missing. This made her even more upset. She needed her phone to call the taxi company to see if she left it in the taxi. But she couldn’t because all her phone numbers were in her phone. Her son Harry always told her to be careful with her phone, and now she wished she had listened.

In the line behind her, a nice couple offered to help. Violet asked to use their phone to call Harry. She left a message for him to ask their neighbor, Kristina, to check if her phone was at home. If it wasn’t, she would have trouble finding important numbers in New York.

Finally, the line moved, and Violet handed over her travel documents to get on the ship. When she entered the ship, it looked like a fancy hotel but not very nice. There were shiny decorations and bright lights everywhere. 

Violet followed the signs to the elevators. The elevator was full of tired passengers, and she felt squished. It stopped at each floor, letting people out until she reached the twelfth floor. 

When she got to her room, she was happy to see it had the balcony she wanted. She had worried about this, but now she felt relieved. She had paid a lot of money to make sure she had a good view of the sea.

When John Maloof bought a box of old photo negatives at an auction, he did not know he was starting to discover the story of Vivian Maier. Maloof wanted pictures for a book about Portage Park, a neighborhood in Chicago, USA. Instead, he found 30,000 photos taken by Maier, a street photographer who had a special talent for taking interesting pictures. Since then, Maloof has collected many things about Maier’s life and work. In his home, he keeps her cameras, 2,000 rolls of film, 3,000 prints, and 100,000 negatives, along with some 8mm movies and audiotapes.

One morning, Maloof looked around at all this and felt excited. He said, “When I bought all this, I had no idea what it was. I could have just sold it to someone else.” For a while, Maloof and his friend Anthony Rydzon have been learning about Maier’s life. They talked to families who hired her as a nanny and to people who developed her film. Maier was born in 1926 in New York and spent much of her childhood in France. In 1951, she returned to New York and then moved to Chicago in 1956 to work as a nanny.

Maier was a private person and always carried a camera. She wore big coats, wide-brimmed hats, and sturdy shoes. Maren Baylaender, whose husband hired Maier to care for his daughter, said, “On her day off, she always had her camera. We wouldn’t see her until late at night.” Maier had strong opinions about movies and politics and knew a lot about theater and films. Even though she was not very social, she walked the streets with her camera and sometimes interviewed people on audiotape. She loved documenting the world around her.

Rydzon said, “She was a true artist and followed her dreams. She didn’t let anything stop her.” Maier’s work is real art; she did not take pictures for money. Her photos often show women, children, the elderly, the poor, and abstract scenes. Photography expert Larry Silverman said, “Vivian has many interesting pictures.” He thinks her work shows the influence of other photographers and wonders if she created her own style.

Maloof often thinks about whether he will ever go through all the negatives he has stored in three tall, fireproof cabinets. He did not care much about photography until he found Maier’s work. Inspired by her photos, he started taking his own pictures. He said, “I realized that the people and street scenes were more important than I thought. I was sitting on something more important than I ever imagined. Now our goal is to make Vivian Maier known and get her into the history books.”

Eleanor Catton is a young writer from New Zealand. Her book, The Luminaries, is very successful. I spoke with her in the UK when her book was popular. She was calm, even though she was busy. She had just come from Germany and was going back to New Zealand the next day.

Eleanor told me a funny story. Once, at passport control, an official asked her to prove she was a writer. She showed her book and the official asked, “What is it about?” This is a hard question for a writer. 

The Luminaries takes place in New Zealand in the 1860s. There are many crimes, and twelve men are trying to solve them. The story is very complicated. Eleanor wanted to write a murder mystery, but she found that using the past made the story more interesting. Her book is over 800 pages long because she wanted to give a good story to each of the 20 main characters.

When I asked her how it feels to be successful at a young age, she said it feels nice. She feels that people from her small country share in her success. She also mentioned that some people think her book is not serious, which annoys her.

Eleanor had a unique idea for her book. She wanted to write it in a spiral shape, where each part is shorter than the one before. This makes the story speed up as you read. She said she wanted to create patterns in the book that readers could notice if they wanted to.

Even with its special structure, The Luminaries is still an exciting murder mystery. Eleanor did not plan the whole story before writing. Instead, she would write herself into difficult situations and then find creative ways to solve them. She wanted to make the book fun for readers.

We also talked about her love for TV dramas. I asked if she would like to write for TV. She thought that could be cool. She gets very excited when she talks about writing and her home in New Zealand. She notices that being in a different place changes how she thinks. Many writers leave New Zealand for bigger cities, but she wants to stay in New Zealand for now. I hope it inspires her to write more novels.

Jonny Kinkead was a boy who loved to make things in his dad's garage and play the guitar. For the last forty years, he has built acoustic guitars by hand. He is still amazed by how two pieces of wood can make beautiful music. Jonny learned to play guitar when he was eleven and wanted to learn bass guitar at sixteen. Instead of saving money for one, he decided to make it himself. He studied how different shapes and types of wood change the sound of the guitar.

Before making the bass guitar, Jonny and his brothers built model boats and planes. Their dad taught them how to use tools. Jonny also fixed instruments for his friends. His first bass guitar was good, but he did not think about making guitars as a job at that time. He liked painting and sculpture too. After school, he studied architecture because he liked design. But halfway through, he left because it was not for him. He realized that making guitars was like making art, but it was something people could use.

Since then, Jonny has made guitars for a living. For ten years, he also cleaned windows to earn extra money. At first, he sold his guitars for the cost of materials, but as he became known as a good guitar maker, he could charge more. Even now, he says he is just getting by. He can only make about ten guitars a year, which limits his income. In the beginning, he worked hard to get known. He went to music festivals to show his guitars and meet musicians.

Jonny thinks it is easier for new guitar makers today. When he started, many people believed that only American guitars were good. But now, UK-made guitars are respected. He believes new makers should take courses to learn valuable skills. However, he also thinks that learning by trying and making mistakes is very important. He says that if you only learn from someone else, you might miss out on other ways to make a good guitar.

When people talk about English conversation, they often start with the weather. A famous writer from the 1700s, Dr. Johnson, said, "When two Englishmen meet, their first talk is of the weather." This is still true today. Many people try to explain why English people talk about the weather so much, but they often get it wrong. They think that English people are very interested in the weather itself.

For example, the American writer Bill Bryson says that English weather is not very interesting. He points out that in England, there are no big storms like tornadoes or monsoons. However, the English broadcaster Jeremy Paxman disagrees. He believes that English weather is interesting because it is always changing. He says that in England, you can never be sure what the weather will be like.

I think both Bryson and Paxman miss the real reason why English people talk about the weather. When they say things like "Nice day, isn’t it?" or "Ooh, isn’t it cold?" they are not really asking about the weather. These phrases are just ways to start a conversation or fill a pause. Talking about the weather is a way for English people to connect with each other, like how monkeys groom each other to bond.

There are three main times when English people talk about the weather: as a greeting, to start a conversation, or when there is a quiet moment and they need something to say. This is why it seems like English people talk about the weather all the time. A conversation might start with a weather greeting, then move to other topics, and return to the weather when there is a pause. This is why many people think that English people are obsessed with the weather.

Alice Leader was standing in front of Hadrian’s Wall in Britain. She was with her class of 12- and 13-year-olds. She wanted to show them how amazing it was that the Romans built a wall that is 120 km long and 5 meters high about 1900 years ago. The students were excited about this trip. They chose it instead of going to Spain, Greece, or France. But they wanted to know why the wall was built. Alice felt she did not have good answers for them. 

Alice could not find a good historical novel about life at the Wall during Roman times. So, she decided to write one herself. After teaching for 31 years, she started a new career as a writer in 2001. She felt nervous but also excited. She said, “Teaching is like acting. It is hard work. Writing is exciting, but it is not so tiring.” Her old teaching friends were jealous because she still connects with children through her stories.

Alice wants her books to be different from many other books for young people today. She thinks many of these books talk about sad things or are just fantasy, like Harry Potter. Her books are not like that. Alice always taught English and History together. She loved to see when a child goes from being bored to being interested. She said, “I love having bored children because it means I need to make them interested.”

Alice started writing because she saw a need for different stories. She also felt a change was coming as her two sons were leaving home. Her head teacher suggested she take a creative writing course. At first, Alice did not want to do it. She had been teaching for 25 years and thought she did not need the course. But she had to send a story to the teachers before she could join. She quickly wrote a story about a Roman couple and their baby. After three hours, she had 30 pages and sent it in. She was accepted into the course.

During the course, other students read her story and gave her good feedback. They told her to try to publish it. Alice asked her school head teacher for a year off to write her first novel. Her husband, Zachary Leader, helped her by editing her work. Alice said, “My mother-in-law thinks we are rival authors, but I think we help each other. He changes my sentences and suggests better words. I like to add more scenes.” This is how Alice sees the difference between a writer and an editor.

To raise money for charity, a newspaper and a TV company asked brothers Jonny and Alistair Brownlee, who are champion triathletes, to join a special race. This race would have Jonny in a car and Alistair on a mountain bike. They would race in the beautiful and hilly Yorkshire Dales in northern England. Jonny would drive on the roads, while Alistair would ride across the countryside.

“I’m excited!” Jonny said at the start line. “I’ve never done this before. The views are beautiful, and it’s cold, so I can stay warm in the car.” Alistair was also excited but wore warm cycling clothes. He joked, “I’ve seen Jonny drive before, so I’m not sure he will win. I might stop for tea on the way!”

The race started at Semerwater lake and would finish at Fleet Moss, which is the highest road in Yorkshire, about 350 meters up. Jonny had an easy drive, but Alistair had to climb a steep hill right away. They quickly shook hands and began the race. Alistair rode fast on his bike, while Jonny got in his car and drove off. The question was, who would finish first?

Jonny’s confidence dropped quickly. Just 15 seconds into his drive, he had to stop for a big tractor on the road. “Welcome to Yorkshire,” he said to the cameraman. “If Alistair beats me, it’s because of this farmer!” After getting past the tractor, Jonny drove on, while Alistair struggled with the hill. He had to get off his bike and carry it up the steep slope, while sheep watched him curiously.

Finally, Alistair reached the top of the hill. The sun came out, and he started to ride faster. Meanwhile, Jonny faced more problems on the narrow roads of the villages. He had to drive slowly and carefully. After leaving the last village, he raced straight to the finish line.

Neither brother knew how close they were to each other. Jonny drove fast towards Fleet Moss, while Alistair rode hard across his last field. As Alistair reached the finish line, he asked the crowd, “Is he here?” When they said no, he raised his arms in joy and shouted, “Yes!”

A few minutes later, Jonny arrived in his car. “Well done,” he said to Alistair, feeling disappointed. “I’m really sad.”

The silence is what you notice when you play on Centre Court at Wimbledon. You bounce the ball quietly on the soft grass. You toss it up to serve and hit it, hearing only your own shot. The quiet place, the nice grass, the history, the old stadium, the players in white, and the respectful crowd all make you feel safe and away from the outside world. This silence helps my game. In a tennis match, I try hard to focus only on the game and the point I am playing. 

When a point ends, the silence breaks with noise: applause, cheers, and people shouting my name. I hear them, but it feels far away. I don’t think about the fifteen thousand people watching me. I am so focused that I don’t realize millions are watching me play Roger Federer in the 2008 Wimbledon final, the biggest match of my life. I always dreamed of playing at Wimbledon. My uncle Toni, my coach, told me from a young age that this was the biggest tournament. By 14, I was telling my friends I would play there one day and win.

Before 2008, I had played and lost to Federer twice in the finals. Losing in 2006 was not too hard. I was happy to be there at twenty years old. Federer won easily. But losing in 2007 was very hard for me. I knew I could have played better, but my mind let me down. I cried for half an hour in the dressing room after that loss. Losing hurts, but it hurts more when you have a chance to win and you lose it. 

Toni is usually tough on me, even when I win. But after my loss in 2007, he told me not to cry and that there would be more chances to play at Wimbledon. I told him he didn’t understand; I thought it was my last chance. I know that a professional athlete's career is short, and I want to make the most of it. Every moment is important, but some moments are more important than others, and I let a big one go in 2007. 

Toni could not make me feel better, but he was right. Another chance came in 2008, just one year later. I felt confident I had learned from my loss. The best sign that I was ready was that I believed I would win. The night before the final, at dinner with my family and friends, we did not talk about the match. I didn’t tell them not to talk about it, but they knew I was already thinking about the game in my mind. From that moment until the match started, that space in my mind was just for me.

In early April 1957, a young Englishwoman named Jane Goodall arrived in Africa. She wrote home saying, "I am living in the Africa I have always wanted." Jane spent most of her life in Africa. She worked as a journalist, scientist, activist, and environmentalist. 

In 1963, Jane became famous when Britain’s National Geographical Society made articles and TV shows about her research on chimpanzees. She also wrote popular books, including children's books and a bestseller called "In the Shadow of Man," which has been translated into 47 languages. Jane Goodall is one of the most famous female scientists of the 20th century. 

Many stories about her life focus on her adventures and dreams, but they often do not show her real achievements. Jane Goodall is a pioneer in her field and is known for her important research on chimpanzees. She helped us understand that chimpanzees have emotions like humans and live in social groups similar to ours. Before her work, people did not know that chimpanzees eat meat or use tools. 

Her book, "The Chimpanzees of Gombe," published in 1986, is a key work in chimpanzee research. Jane studied wild chimpanzees in Gombe State, Nigeria, for many years. Her work changed how we study animals and how we think about ourselves as humans.

Even as a child, Jane showed her interest in animals. When she was five years old, she disappeared one day. Her family and the police searched for her. After a long search, she came back with straw in her hair. She had crawled into a henhouse to see how hens lay eggs. She stayed very still for five hours until she got her answer. This moment shows her early love for biology.

Shirley Ford is a voiceover artist. In our first conversation, she shows me many different voices. She can sound like a funny 8-year-old boy, a tired mother, an old Scottish woman, and even a fast-talking alien. People who watch children’s TV and cartoons know her voices well. Shirley tells me she just did a voiceover about back injuries and had to learn many medical words quickly.

Shirley explains that doing voiceovers is not just about being funny. You need to make the script interesting for people who cannot see you. Many famous actors want to do voiceovers, but they often do not get the job because they are used to acting with their whole bodies.

After school, Shirley took a drama course. She wanted to be a regular actor. While studying, she sang jingles for TV ads. One day, the man at the recording studio asked her to try out for a rabbit character in a cartoon. She thought it was silly but tried it for fun and got the part. This made her realize she could do voices well and that voiceover work could be her career.

In her second film, she played the main character and also her brother and mother. Many adult women do the voices for small boys and girls because their voices are higher. It is complicated to hire child actors, so production companies often prefer adult women.

Shirley learned to make different sounds and to not always sound the same. She watches children’s TV to collect new voices. She enjoys working on cartoons the most, but she also does educational videos and ads. Sometimes, she has to sound excited about things she does not care about, like vacuum cleaners. She says smiling while talking makes her voice sound happy.

The competition for voiceover work is tough. A good showreel, which shows what an artist can do, is very important. Shirley believes it is worth making a strong showreel. There are agencies that help voiceover artists create them. She thinks she has succeeded because she works hard and does not give up.

For people who want to be voiceover artists, Shirley suggests going to special workshops that teach different types of voiceover work. She loves voices and often becomes the characters she plays. Sometimes, after doing a specific voice, she continues to talk like that for hours or even days. Her children are used to her speaking in many different voices.

People often ask me how I became a cartoonist. This is normal because many kids dream of being cartoonists, just like they dream of being race car drivers. But most people stop dreaming and choose more practical jobs, like being a tax lawyer or making car parts. It seems silly to think you can make a living by drawing simple pictures, but some people do it.

Not everyone becomes a cartoonist in the same way, but most have wanted to be one for a long time. I loved comic strips as a child, drew for school papers, and was known as "the kid who draws." I studied graphic design in college. After I graduated, I showed my drawings to different companies. I was lucky to find a newspaper that wanted political cartoons about local issues. I created some ideas, and they bought them. Soon, I was making enough money to live on.

You don’t need much to be a cartoonist. You don’t need a university degree, a lot of money, or even great drawing skills. You just need your brain, your hand, and something to draw with. But if it were that easy, there would be many more cartoonists than teachers. Being a cartoonist is hard work. It is easier to get a regular job that pays well and gives you time for family and hobbies.

The more skills you have, the better chance you have to earn money with your art. I have done political cartoons, comic strips, and comic books. I have also written, made caricatures, and designed things. I take any job because you can learn a lot, even from work you don’t like. It helps to be smart, read a lot, and be curious about the world.

What about the business side of being a cartoonist? In the past, many cartoonists had regular jobs with different newspapers and magazines. Now, most cartoonists have to sell their own work. If you are good at business, you will do better. I have seen cartoonists who are not very creative but have good business skills do much better than those who are very talented but don’t know how to sell their work.

Some people worry too much about others stealing their ideas. They are so scared that they won’t even show their work to anyone! To protect your work, you just need to draw a small ‘c’ for ‘copyright,’ put a circle around it, and write your name and the date. But honestly, it is more likely that no one will care about your work. If someone does take your cartoon and it becomes popular online, it is not a disaster – it can actually be a great opportunity!

Twenty years ago, I was moving to a new house and cleaning out my things. I decided to throw away an electric guitar that my dad had given me for my 16th birthday. It was a nice black guitar from Japan. I usually don’t like to throw things away, so I was surprised I wanted to get rid of it. I took it to the dump and was about to put it in the trash when a young man came up to me. He looked confused and asked, “You’re not going to throw that away, are you?” I said yes, and he asked if he could have it. I said yes, and we went our separate ways. 

After that, I felt sad about giving it away. A few months ago, I opened an email that changed everything. I remembered a story about a man who lost his wedding ring in the ocean and found it years later in a fish. That’s how I felt when I read the email from a man named Keith Rushton, who fixes and sells guitars. He said, “I have your electric guitar.” 

The guitar had been sold many times since I gave it away. Keith found my name on a label on the guitar and looked for me online. He contacted me through the newspaper I work for and offered to sell it back to me. I was so happy! I would have given him anything for it, but his price was fair. I had forgotten that my dad put name labels on everything I owned, even my guitar. My parents wanted me to learn classical guitar because it was popular in the 1970s. I loved the sound of it; it was calm and gentle. But I didn’t get better at it, so I switched to electric guitar, which was easier to play.

When I opened the box with my old guitar, I remembered my birthday in 1978 when my parents gave it to me. Holding it again felt amazing. I had to stand up and put a strap on my shoulder because electric guitars are played that way. My fingers remembered where to go. I couldn’t draw the chords, but my hands knew what to do. Playing the guitar hurt my fingers a little, but it felt good. 

Electric guitars are usually played in a band. Now that I am learning again, I think I should form a band. My son is learning the saxophone, so maybe we can play together. Or maybe I can find other people my age who have had a similar experience. We could call ourselves “The Regainers!”

Text: 

There has been a lot of talk about sleep recently. I wrote a book called Insomniac about people who cannot sleep well. I wanted to warn people about the dangers of not getting enough sleep. Sleep is very important for our minds, bodies, and feelings. People who have trouble sleeping know how important sleep is. It is good that people are now talking more about sleep. 

But what about dreams? I have not heard much about dreams in these talks. We lose our dreams all the time. When you wake up early because of an alarm, you miss the last hour or two of sleep. This lost sleep is mostly REM sleep, which is the stage of sleep when we dream the most. Our best and most memorable dreams happen in REM sleep just before we wake up.
